title: Can we please transfer servers now ?
body:
Riot said we can in Nov 20 .. its 21 now 

I've been waiting for a month now

replies.body: Quite a few players have been waiting for transfers to return, but it looks to be delayed. I don't have any info right now, but will offer updates as they come.
Will they make it free again to change region? {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
ive been waiting since season 3 lmao
